content: * until end turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method round 6 ws ch2 double_crochet each st around skipping chain 1 from previous round turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method round 7 rs repeat round 3 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 6 round 8 ws repeat round 4 round 9 rs repeat 5 round 10 ws repeat round 6 if you like the width of your scarf proceed to round 11 if you want a wide scarf repeat rounds 7-10 till desired width *continue on to round 11 to end your scarf* *now working in a continuous round no turning* round 11 rs ch1 l single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in each stitch around slp to first single_crochet round 12 rs ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in each st around slp to first single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends and enjoy ☺ this example finished piece 22 1/2 long 5 tall 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 7 about the designer hello my name is sam crochet designer of ixanicreations i once picked up a crochet hook when i was 9 years old but could only make a chain so i lost interest it wasn t until 2022 i picked up the art of crochet and was hooked i started teaching myself everyday in 2023 since i couldn t put my hook down i went down the fancy hole of pattern testing and met some wonderful people along the way some that pushed my interest into designing this is my first design i named the scarf lucrecia which means to bring light my personality is to bring the light to people when times feel dark my hopes that in creating this scarf may you have that light brought to you i would love to see your work tag me ixanicreations on instagram see next page for the wonderful testers who helped made this scarf possible 2024 ixanicreations please do not
